data.title: ‎‘Kevin & Perry Go Large’ review by Darren Carver
data.meta_description: To be blunt, this was quite a poorly made movie filled with crude and witless jokes. However, watched with friends, Kevin & Perry Go Large is actually a fair amount of brainless fun. The jokes, whilst repetitive, tend to generally land and I found myself chuckling along at the exaggerated teen antics central to the story. It's immature but the film-making is surprisingly solid with a strong, if predictable, setup. It may not be genius, but Kevin & Perry Go Large is dumb and fun is equal measure. I feel bad for liking it so much. Also, I can't decide whether to commend or
data.text:
To be blunt, this was quite a poorly made movie filled with crude and witless jokes. However, watched with friends, Kevin & Perry Go Large is actually a fair amount of brainless fun. The jokes, whilst repetitive, tend to generally land and I found myself chuckling along at the exaggerated teen antics central to the story. It's immature but the film-making is surprisingly solid with a strong, if predictable, setup. It may not be genius, but Kevin & Perry Go Large is dumb and fun is equal measure. I feel bad for liking it so much.

Also, I can't decide whether to commend or disparage the filmmakers for committing to so many erection jokes.
